attributes.action: Make South Park compulsary viewing at School for all children aged 11+
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: South Park is one of the most informative and comical cartoons ever made, it is a legendary blend of youthful antics and each episode has a well balanced moral at the end which we shoulld all teach our children.  In these modern times our children should harness these South Park episodes and all that is contained within them.  I beleive South Park is god, and I put it to you to accept my proposal and indeed to declare a UK National annual bank holiday devoted to the little "Cartman" in all of us!  I am the Meat!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
